thread.title: Rachel Maddow Tells Desus and Mero About How She Uses Sci-Fi to Contextualize Trump
thread.title_full: Rachel Maddow Tells Desus and Mero About How She Uses Sci-Fi to Contextualize Trump - VICE

author: Sarah Bellman
title: Rachel Maddow Tells Desus and Mero About How She Uses Sci-Fi to Contextualize Trump
text:
With politicalscandals and unprecedented events circulating the news daily, it can be extremely taxing for journalists toreport on theTrump administration. Of course,Rachel Maddow knows this all too well.
When she visited VICELAND's talk show Desus & Mero , theMSNBC hosttoldKid Mero and Desus Nice about how she now finds unique ways to dissectour political climateciting events from our past, other countries' histories, and even science fiction.
Additionally,Maddowgave the hosts her hot take on Jill Stein, Hillary Clinton, vacationing Obama, and her ride-or-die colleague Chris Hayes .Check out her full interview below.
You can watch last night's Desus & Mero for free online now, and be sure to catch new episodes weeknights at 11 PM on VICELAND.
